original_text: There were two Israelite women who helped the other women when they were giving birth. These two women were called Shiphrah and Puah. The king of Egypt said to them,
korean_text: 애굽 왕이 히브리 산파 십브라라 하는 사람과 부아라 하는 사람에게 말하여

sentences.original_text: These two women were called Shiphrah and Puah
sentences.korean_translation: 이 두 여인은 시브라와 부아라고 불렸습니다

sentences.original_text: The king of Egypt said to them
